dialogue: Excellent! You know, I didn't even realize I wanted tea until you brought me that teabag. Great initiative!
You put SUGAR in HOT TEA? Quincible, do you think I'm some kind of a savage??
I'm sorry, [name], but this just won't do. I think you should go home early today.
With a sigh, I leave. Emma gives me a sad look as our new boss - well, HER new boss - continues to rail her.
It looks like that'll never be me. If only I'd remembered he didn't like sugar in his tea!
